-1.caption: 1983 Major League Baseball Hall of Fame Game

2.caption: 1983 Major League Baseball All-Star Game
2.description: George Maloney was the last home plate umpire to work an All-Star game wearing the outside chest protector long favored by umpires in the American League. Maloney was one of only four active umpires in 1983 still using the outside protector. He and Russ Goetz retired following the 1983 season. Bill Kunkel soldiered on while battling cancer, succumbing in May 1985. Jerry Neudecker, the last outside protector holdout, retired after the 1985 season.
2.inspected:Radio announcers: Brent Musburger, Duke Snider and Brooks Robinson
